title: Board Level 0?
body: I can't post comments anywhere on the boards because I'm not level 6 or 7, or whatever is needed for a particular board.  I'm assuming board level should be the same as summoner level because I don't see any FAQ or Guide that outlines how to increase board levels, but I've been playing LoL for about 2 years and am level 30 in game.  How do I increase my board level so I can post in all the forums?

replies.body: Sometimes it takes a little bit for your boards level to correctly sync up with your Summoner Level. Once you posted here, it must have forced an update, because you're showing up as a full grown level 30 now ^_^!
